text: The People's Museum in Malacca City, Malacca, Malaysia, records and preserves Malacca's achievements in development. It was officially opened on 15 April 1992 by Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. The museum is on the ground floor of the former Historical City of Malacca Municipal Council building, built in the 1960s on the ruins of a Dutch building. The upper floors house the Beauty Museum and Kite Museum. ==Gallery== File:People's Museum - Transportation Area.JPG|Transportation area File:2016 Malakka, Muzeum Ludowe, Stara lokomotywa "Sungai Lukut" (04).jpg|Sungai Lukut locomotive File:Lang Rajawali FM1064 Twin Pioneer.jpg|Lang Rajawali File:Twin Pioneer CC.Mk 1 Undercarriage.jpg|Plane undercarriage, with railway carriage beyond ==References== Category:1992 establishments in Asia Category:1990s establishments in Malaysia Category:Museums in Malaysia Category:Buildings and structures in Malacca Category:Malacca City
title: People's Museum
